description: Mysore pak is a melt in the mouth Indian sweet treat.
keywords: Slice,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Mysore Pak Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil and ghee in a large saucepan until the ghee has melted. Remove 1/3 of the mixture and set aside. Whisk in the chickpea flour until smooth.
Place the sugar in a large, wide saucepan and add 125ml of water, bring to the boil and cook for 2-3 minutes until reduced and stringy when pulled with a spoon.

Add the sugar mix to the chickpea flour mix and combine. Stir in the remaining ghee and oil and mix well. Cook on medium low heat for 5 minutes until bubbling and thick, remove from the heat and stir for 1 minute.
Pour the mix into a parchment lined tin and smooth out with a spatula. Leave to cool for 15 minutes, slice and serve.
